creditline: Gift of Sue Y.S. Kimm and Seymour Grufferman
description: rectangular box with small feet with decorative openwork fittings and scrolling aprons; red exterior, black interior; turtle-shaped latch on front top; large openwork scalloped fitting on top front; decorative openwork fittings on top left and right edges and at top front; top cover hinged; pair of front doors open to reveal pair of drawers with round pulls
title: Red footed box with tortoise latch
